title: Osananajimi ga Do M de Tsundere Nan desu ga
original_name: 幼なじみがド M でツンデレなんですが
sinopse:
Suzume is a total and utter masochistic bottom. He blows his nights having fun with guys, no strings attached. His crazy lifestyle then catches the attention of his childhood friend, Momo. Suzume knows this and also the fact that Momo likes him, but he pretends to be oblivious. But one day, Momo tells him that he's always loved him, but...

(Source: Hoshikuzuu Scans)
